scripts.build: pnpm db:generate && tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const items=fs.readdirSync(src);for(const item of items){const srcPath=path.join(src,item);const destPath=path.join(dest,item);if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}}copyDir('src/generated','dist/generated');"
